title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-4.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-4.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Subpart applies to all new, modified, and existing
cremation units used for the cremation of human and animal
remains. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
219-4.2

Amended

New

York State Register March 4, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 9, eff. 3/14/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
